articles.description: The latest Windows 10 feature update lets you personalize your taskbar for quick access to information like weather, sports and traffic on your Microsoft device. Here's how to do it.
articles.content:
Keep up with news you're interested in with Microsoft's Windows 10 taskbar update, rolling out now.

articles.title: iOS 14.5 and Face ID: Unlocking your iPhone with a mask on actually works now, kind of - CNET
articles.description: Tired of Face ID failing when you're wearing a face mask? iOS 14.5 now eliminates the hassle, but you'll need to have an Apple Watch.
articles.content:
With the release of iOS 14.5, Apple will make it easier to unlock your iPhone while wearing a mask.
